trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> método antes de adicionar um controle a uma zona de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento fornece uma oportunidade de cancelar o processo antes de ser concluída.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> evento é chamado depois que um controle foi adicionado a uma zona de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventHandler> delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método especificado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventHandler> delegado é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de páginas podem fornecer manipuladores personalizados para o evento adicionando o `OnWebPartAdding` de atributo para o `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento em uma página e atribuir um nome de método personalizado para o atributo.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador personalizado também pode ser atribuído programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como atribuir programaticamente um manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: como: conectar-se métodos do manipulador de eventos para eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
